sentence: Profesionales de psicología, relaciones internacionales y máster en Diplomacia y Política de Defensa y Seguridad Internacional
translation: Professionals in psychology, international relations, and a master's degree in Diplomacy and International Defense and Security Policy

sentence: personal de fuerzas y cuerpos de seguridad
y fuerzas armadas -también provenientes de diversas comunidades autónomas- asisten al curso "La reorganización del (des)orden mundial tras la crisis de Ucrania"
translation: and armed forces - also from various autonomous communities - attend the course "The reorganization of the (dis)order world after the crisis in Ukraine"

sentence: que se imparte del 4 al 7 de julio
translation: which is held from 4th to 7th July

sentence: La conferencia inaugural, Del viejo al nuevo (des)orden mundial, la ha pronunciado el jurista cartagenero Federico Trillo Figueroa, expresidente de las Cortes, exministro de Defensa y exembajador en Reino Unido
translation: The inaugural conference, "From the old to the new (dis)order of the world," was delivered by the Cartagena jurist Federico Trillo Figueroa, former president of the Courts, former Minister of Defense, and former ambassador to the United Kingdom
